writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel parcel, int i)

Returns: The String identifier for this task, that is returned to onRunTask(com.google.android.gms.gcm.TaskParams) when this task executes.
The GcmTaskService component that this task will execute on.
Whether or not this task will update a pre-existing task in the scheduler queue.

ClassDesc: Encapsulates the parameters of a task that you will schedule on the GcmNetworkManager. Construct instances of either PeriodicTask or OneoffTask with the desired parameters/behaviour and schedule them using schedule(Task).
